<Avatar
  src="images/avatars/blackwidow.png"
  size="large"

/>

  <Avatar
    src="images/avatars/captainamerica.png"
    name="Steve Rogers"
    size="large"
    interactive
  />
  <Avatar
    src="images/avatars/ironman.png"
    name="Tony Stark"
    size="large"
    interactive
  />

</AvatarGroup>

<AvatarGroup dense>
  <Avatar
    src="images/avatars/captainamerica.png"
    name="Steve Rogers"
    size="large"
    interactive
  />
  <Avatar
    src="images/avatars/ironman.png"
    name="Tony Stark"
    size="large"
    interactive

</AvatarGroup>

/>
